mapper.select: SELECT /* cslIsp.getCslIspList */ CI.ISP_DT , CI.MBR_NO , CI.MNG_TP_CD , SC.CD_NM AS MNG_TP_NM , CI.ISP_RST , CI.CRE_ID , SU.USR_NM AS CRE_NM FROM CSL_ISP CI LEFT JOIN SYS_USR SU ON (CI.CRE_ID = SU.USR_ID) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC ON (SC.GRP_CD = 'C4200' AND CI.MNG_TP_CD = SC.CD_ID) WHERE CI.MBR_NO = #{mbrNo} ORDER BY CI.CRE_DT DESC

SELECT /* cslIsp.getCslIspInfo */ CI.ISP_DT , CI.MBR_NO , CI.MNG_TP_CD , SC.CD_NM AS MNG_TP_NM , CI.EVL_ITM_SCO01 , CI.EVL_ITM_SCO02 , CI.EVL_ITM_SCO03 , CI.EVL_ITM_SCO04 , CI.EVL_ITM_SCO05 , CI.EVL_ITM_SCO06 , CI.EVL_ITM_SCO07 , CI.EVL_ITM_SCO08 , CI.EVL_ITM_SCO09 , CI.EVL_ITM_SCO10 , CI.EVL_ITM_SCO11 , CI.EVL_ITM_SCO12 , CI.EVL_ITM_SCO13 , CI.EVL_ITM_SCO14 , CI.EVL_ITM_SCO15 , CI.EVL_ITM_SCO16 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK01 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK02 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK03 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK04 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK05 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK06 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK07 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK08 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK09 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK10 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK11 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK12 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK13 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK14 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK15 , CI.EVL_ITM_LNK16 , CI.ISP_RST , CI.TGT_CTNT , CI.CRE_ID , CI.CRE_DT , CI.UPD_ID , CI.UPD_DT FROM CSL_ISP CI LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC ON (SC.GRP_CD = 'C4200' AND CI.MNG_TP_CD = SC.CD_ID) where MBR_NO = #{mbrNo} AND ISP_DT = #{ispDt}
